about_the_game:
Death-worshipping cult is plunging the world into darkness by using Varjomana to resurrect the dead, but they made a huge mistake: THEY RESURRECTED ALSO YOU, an ancient battlemage. Once forgotten, now reborn.

Step into the chaotic realm of Varjomana, a high-adrenaline, retro-inspired shooter. Harness the power of dual-wield magic, where each hand operates independently.

Fight a death-worshipping cult bent on raising the dead and plunging the world into eternal darkness. With tight controls, lightning-fast gameplay, and a vibrant retro aesthetic, Varjomana throws you back into the golden era of FPS games. 

Key Features:

  • Speedrun Friendly: Arcade-style movement and fast pacing make it ideal for speedrunning.

  • 1990s Retro Style: Low poly art and nostalgic soundscapes transport you to the golden age of shooters.

  • Spellcasting Freedom: Wield independent spells in both hands to solve each situation by your own way.

Perfect your spells, speed up your movement, and become the shadow that stands against the darkness!

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains blood and gore. The game's themes incudes dark magic, dark rituals, resurrection, vengance and death cults.
